>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites capably innovate new features when you manifest nanite weapons. Choose two of the following special weapon properties: block, bright, deflectAR, feintAR, grapple, harryingAR, penetrating, stun, sunder, or trip. Each time you form a weapon using your gear array, you can apply one of the selected special weapon properties to that weapon. You can select this knack multiple times; each time, select two additional special weapon properties and add them to the list of available properties (you still apply only one at a time).
